name: Alche-Tea
description:
Controls: Left click to click and drag.

Alche-Tea is a chill game about using base elements to craft products for a potentially noxious cup of tea. Store your elements in jars, mix the products together, add them to the pot. See how high a score you can get! Alche-Tea was developed over the course of the weekend in GameMaker Studio 2 with visuals created in Clip Studio Paint for Ludum Dare 49 jam (theme: Unstable).

We hope you enjoy!
